name: Unfairways
description:
CONTROLS

A golf game with an icosahedric twist, click and drag to control the direction the d20 will go. Drag your mouse into the bottom right corner and release to undo your current roll. Space-bar to zoom out and see the map, How hard you hit comes from... A roll of the dice!

***NOTICE***
Due to an error the game stops letting you take shots halfway through, consider this a demo of the full game. We got it fixed 18 seconds after the upload timer, so the rest of the game will be available after the voting period ends!
***NOTICE***

Made by:

  • Alex Rose: Design / Development
  • Nick Muniz: Development
  • Marco Ravelo: Art & Sound / Development

For the GMTK22 Game Jam!
